text: W. M. Irvin was an American football coach. He served as the head football coach at Franklin & Marshall College in Lancaster, Pennsylvania. He held that position for the 1889 season. His coaching record at Franklin & Marshall was 5–1–1. ==Head coaching record== ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Franklin & Marshall Diplomats football coaches
title: W. M. Irvin
